title-part.text: DESIGN OR LAYOUT OF COURTS, RINKS OR THE LIKE

reference.text: devices for underwater sports A63B31/00, A63B33/00, B63C11/00; devices for gliding on water, e.g. water skis, B63B35/79, B63B35/81, B63B35/83

note.note-paragraph:
The following IPC groups are not used in the CPC scheme. Subject matter covered by these groups is classified in the following CPC groups:
A63C5/025 covered by A63C5/00
A63C5/14 covered by A63C5/12

reference.text: roller skates or skate boards A63C17/00

with sole and heel plates each equipped with clamps

tightened by the movement of the foot
tightened by lateral swinging or shifting of the blade or of the whole skate

with special foot-plates of the boot
divided into two parts permitting adjustment to the size of the foot

title-part.text: Use of skates, skis, roller-skates, snowboards and courts
Special features of skates, skis, roller-skates, snowboards and courts
enabling transverse riding, i.e. with one runner or skate per foot and direction transverse to the foot
replacing in the binding the shoe by another device
Measuring a physical parameter, e.g. speed, distance
Radio waves emitting or receiving, e.g. remote control, RFID
Processing or storing data, e.g. with electronic chip
